response.original_title: Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma
response.overview: Four corrupted fascist libertines round up 9 teenage boys and girls and subject them to 120 days of sadistic physical, mental and sexual torture.
response.tagline: The final vision of a controversial filmmaker.
response.title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
